title: MD
biography: Krishna Chandra Das, also known as K.C. Das, was a Bengali confectioner, entrepreneur, and businessman. He contributed to the modernization of traditional Bengali sweets.
aiSummary: P. K. Das is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 64 at Oral cancer epidemiology (Member). Has been published in The Journal of cell biology, ACS biomaterials science & engineering, Protein science : a publication of the Protein Society. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
